message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I understand you want a larger share, but that's not very fair to me. How about a 55/45 split in my favor? It's still a good deal considering the inflation.
Considering the inflation, my previous offer is not that bad, but I'm willing to compromise a bit, 58-42 is the lowest I can go.
Alice, we're running out of time and the value is dropping fast.  52/48 is my final offer. It's more than fair considering the circumstances.
